summary.para: Creates a write-only bundle object to which encrypted Windows app packages can be added.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.

param.name: bundleVersion
param.para: The version number of the bundle. If the bundle version is 0, a default version based on the current system time will be generated.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the package.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the bundle. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: Files exempted from the bundle writer.

param.name: bundleWriter
param.para: The bundle writer object created.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates a new instance of an .

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for sending bytes produced by the app package.

param.name: manifestStream
param.para: A readable stream that defines the package for the AppxManifest.xml.

param.name: contentGroupMapStream
param.para: A stream that defines the content group map.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the package.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the package. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: Files exempted from the package writer.

param.name: packageWriter
param.para: The package writer object created.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates an encrypted Windows app bundle from an unencrypted one.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app bundle to encrypt.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the bundle.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the bundle. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: Files exempted from the bundle writer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates an encrypted Windows app package from an unencrypted one.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app bundle to encrypt.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the bundle.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the bundle. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: Files exempted from the package writer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates objects for encrypting, decrypting, reading, and writing Windows app packages and bundles.
